DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; AFGHANISTAN ; PRESIDENT ' S TROOPS ADVANCE ON RIVALS
DOC.TEXT: President Burhanuddin Rabbani ' s army launched bombing raids , ground assaults and a relentless rocket attack in a major offensive designed to drive_back rival Islamic factions entrenched outside Kabul . His troops claimed advances after a day that included some of the most intense fighting since a battle for the capital resumed Jan . 1 .
